TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(object sender, KeyboardEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyboardEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyboardEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyboardEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyboardEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: O objeto em que o manipulador de eventos está anexado.

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: Representa o método que manipulará eventos roteados relacionados ao teclado.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle keyboard-related routed events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nenhum evento de teclado existente nos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usa o delegate.No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the delegate. usa o base de sua classe de dados de evento. uses the base class as its event data class. serve como a classe base para o mais específico e classes de dados de evento. serves as the base class for the more specific and event data classes. Essas classes de dados de evento são usadas pelo e delegados e os delegados são usados por existente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] eventos como e .These event data classes are used by the and delegates, and those delegates are used by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] events such as and .
